ValidationRule.description: If Request type is RFP, RFQ, RFI or Proposal is selected then "What do you intend to Propose?" is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( ISPICKVAL ( Request_Type__c , 'Request for Proposal (RFP)'), ISPICKVAL ( Request_Type__c , 'Request for Information (RFI)'), ISPICKVAL ( Request_Type__c , 'Request for Quote (RFQ)'), ISPICKVAL ( Request_Type__c , 'Proposal'),
(ISBLANK ( What_do_you_intend_to_Propose__c )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please make selection(s) for this Request Type.
